issue.title: Not able to visualise ur10 in gzweb / gazebo7

content.raw:
@ianchen OK I wasn't sure which version to use. I've now tried it gzweb 1.3.0 but I get the same results. When you inserted the ur10 model in gazebo did you use the urdf model or a srdf directly?

I'm trying to get it running from the ROS package (with a few necessary modifications as explained above).
content.html:
